tabs.content:
Ammamma's products are healthy and full of goodness. Presenting to you our premium quality Ghee for your daily requirement of natural and healthy fats. Easy to digest and good for immunity, Ammamma Ghee is rich, luscious and absolutely delicious. It is rich in nutrition and very easy to cook. Ammamma is a pure India-based company and the range of products is 100% genuine and of the best quality. Now, you can make your favourite desserts all at ease and with the richness Ammamma ensures.

Our ghee is perfect for sauteing, frying and roasting. With no added preservatives, additives, colours, flavours and MSG, what you get is fresh and best quality ghee with a richness all around. To know more, you can explore our whole range of products! Benefits "Shudh" Ghee. Made from A-grade quality milk fat. Easy to cook. High in nutrition. Hygienically processed and packed. 100% vegetarian. Rich in taste. A proud India-based product. It has a shelf life of 6 months. Storage Instructions: Best to be stored in a cool and dry place.
tabs.title: About the Product

tabs.content:
1. Ghee is perfect for frying, roasting, and sauteing meats, veggies, and eggs.
  2. You can use it as a condiment on a baked potato, or roasted squash and can also use it like butter on bread and bagels.
